short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for displaying menu from our favorite canteen PE-PE (jidelnapepe.cz) and allows to see older menus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extension that displays menu from our favorite canteen PE-PE (jidelnapepe.cz). When extension is opened it send an HTTP GET request to API. When it receives a response it builds the menu and shows it to the user. There is abutton for forcing a reload and a link to original menu page - jidelnapepe.cz.
